about_the_game:
DISCORD Channel

Join our DISCORD community at for updates and discussions!

About Controllers

We strongly recommend using a game controller for the best gaming experience. Keyboard and mouse are also supported, but brace yourself for a unique challenge. If you encounter any controller compatibility issues, please check your controller settings in Steam. You can also download the demo version to test your controller before making a purchase.

About Online Play

Since online multiplayer relies on Steam P2P, the network environments of both you and your friends can affect the online experience. If you encounter any online play issues with your friends, consider trying out some accelerators designed to improve Steam P2P connectivity.

Game Overview

Wanba Warriors is a uniquely abstract 1v1 fighting game set in an ancient world with supernatural powers and unconventional weapons. Extraordinary Wanba Warriors from all corners have gathered to showcase their skills in epic battles. Choose from a variety of characters to battle friends or AI opponents, mastering tactics in this wonderfully bizarre world. Battles are quick and satisfying, delivering joy with each hit and minimal frustration with each loss.

The base game currently features six distinct characters, and we have released multiple DLCs, each introducing characters with vastly different styles.

Game Features


  • Local and online battles to dominate your opponents.
  • Abstract character designs with expressive facial expressions.
  • A brand-new, physics-based gaming style using just one joystick and two buttons.
  • Multiple selectable characters with unique abilities, diverse personalities, and varied fighting styles.
  • Stamina settings to prevent controller strain and extend the life of your gamepad.
  • The harder you swing, the more damage you deal, resulting in satisfying, bone-crushing combat.
  • Stunning health bar visuals that will leave you amazed.

short_description: Have you got what it takes to be a Wanba Warrior? Step into the absurd world of calligraphy combat and prepare to lay the smackdown upon all who dare to oppose you, dishing out damage with your chosen ink brush of brutality! highly recommend playing with controllers.
